reply: Thank you for providing the load information. Please note that load #903113 is currently stuck at the shipper. We are actively working to resolve the situation and will provide updates as soon as possible. If you have any questions or need further assistance, please let us know.
Thank you for the update on load 789332. It is currently in "Awaiting POD" status. If you require any further assistance or updates, please feel free to reach out.

Thank you for the update. The load with ID 546789 is currently delayed, with the new estimated time of arrival (ETA) set for 3:45PM outside Houston. If you require further assistance or updates, please let me know.
